tool_description: Converts calendar dates and times to Julian Day Numbers for astronomical calculations, accounting for time zones and geographic locations.

latitude.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for date parameter
Invalid time format: Use HH:MM:SS format for time parameter
Coordinates out of range: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Unsupported timezone: Provide a valid timezone identifier
usage: Provide date, time, latitude, and longitude. Optionally specify timezone (defaults to UTC). Returns Julian Day Number and related astronomical time values.

julian_day.description: Julian Day Number for the specified date/time
